series_description: Documents the results of periodic audits on the financial activities of state agencies and local governments, including courts, institutions, colleges and universities, and political subdivisions. Audits are conducted by the Auditor of Public Accounts and by independent certified public accountants.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years in agency, then transfer to , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.

series_description: Documents the audit proceedings and provides analysis and substantiation for the Audit Reports.
retention_statement: Retain 4 years in agency, then transfer to StateRecords Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in RecordsCenter 4 years. Total retention 8 years.

series_title: Comparative Report of Local Government Revenues and Expenditures
series_description: Documents the results of a statistical comparative survey based on annual audits of local governments, as reported to the General Assembly. Includes information on revenues and expenditures.
retention_statement: Retain five copies permanently in agency. Transfer one copy to , Library of Virginia. Send 20 copies to State Documents Receiving, Library of Virginia, per Code of Virginia, ยง 2.1-467.2.

series_title: Comparative Report of Local Government Revenues and Expenditures - Work Papers
series_description: Documents the substantiation of a statistical comparative survey based on annual audits of local governments, as reported to the General Assembly. Includes information on revenues and expenditures.
